name: Lazer Rush Reloaded
description:
Lazer Rush is a thrilling FPS Platformer that combines chaotic shoot-outs with intense platforming. Fight evil robots with melee and ranged combat as well as special weapon powers. Double Jump and climb up ladders and ledges across platforming challenges that highly utilize verticality. Combine them both for a cinematic but untethered rollercoaster of a game. Jump in and feel the Lazer Rush.

Climb, slide downhill and be launched through action-packed levels.
Play through crafted moments that feel straight out of an action movie that also have unconfined gameplay.

Experience challenging chaotic combat.
Run and jump around at high speeds with advanced movement.

Live on the edge with intense platform combat.

Lazer Rush features 8 core and 3 challenge levels.
